      Overview

      • header fixed: css causes this to be "floating" on top, so the bottom things take reference from the top of the window, not the bottom of this element
        • how to make header fixed while not
      • pagenav, sitenav must also be sticky
      • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/54689034/pure-css-multiple-stacked-position-sticky
        • sticky elements stick to the edge of its containing box hence making header sticky breaks pagenav and sitenav
        • so there must be a containing block after headerfixed that holds pagenav and sitenav? <- this won't work, the containing block scrolls with the whole page
